  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo">StatisticInfo</a></>}>
This class is used in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/managedstatic">ManagedStatic</a> so that it is created on demand (when the first statistic is bumped) and destroyed only when llvm&#95;shutdown is called. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RegisterStatistic - The first time a statistic is bumped, this method is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#af204074bb99629a0b644be5a81b1a269"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#af204074bb99629a0b644be5a81b1a269">TrackingStatistic::RegisterStatistic</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If stats are enabled, inform StatInfo that this statistic should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// printed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm&#95;shutdown calls destructors while holding the ManagedStatic mutex.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These destructors end up calling PrintStatistics, which takes StatLock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since dereferencing StatInfo and StatLock can require taking the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ManagedStatic mutex, doing so with StatLock held would lead to a lock</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order inversion. To avoid that, we dereference the ManagedStatics first,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and only take StatLock afterwards.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#ac316effa43b4fd54b6451be0a3cc3d69">Initialized</a>.load(std::memory&#95;order&#95;relaxed)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex">sys::SmartMutex&lt;true&gt;</a> &amp;Lock = &#42;<a href="#ac984e1f297b2dac8cbf7c4cf8777e4ea">StatLock</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StatisticInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = &#42;<a href="#a9d1a0181d192027598d0cf59a7291e5d">StatInfo</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1094ec958353ee43bd8ffd18187b1160">sys::SmartScopedLock&lt;true&gt;</a> Writer(Lock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check Initialized again after acquiring the lock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#ac316effa43b4fd54b6451be0a3cc3d69">Initialized</a>.load(std::memory&#95;order&#95;relaxed))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a38906af8cc37ba9ddf2260cf1e2b0483">EnableStats</a> || <a href="#a558f5c44426d0eb7abb82a65e8892d9a">Enabled</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.addStatistic(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember we have been registered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#ac316effa43b4fd54b6451be0a3cc3d69">Initialized</a>.store(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, std::memory&#95;order&#95;release);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo/#a66a9ccf524624d58bb8f87b75dcb2b34"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-statistic-cpp-/statisticinfo/#a66a9ccf524624d58bb8f87b75dcb2b34">StatisticInfo::reset</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1094ec958353ee43bd8ffd18187b1160">sys::SmartScopedLock&lt;true&gt;</a> Writer(&#42;<a href="#ac984e1f297b2dac8cbf7c4cf8777e4ea">StatLock</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tell each statistic that it isn&#39;t registered so it has to register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// again. We&#39;re holding the lock so it won&#39;t be able to do so until we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// finished. Once we&#39;ve forced it to re-register (after we return), then zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Stat : Stats) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value updates to a statistic that complete before this statement in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration for that statistic will be lost as intended.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Stat-&gt;Initialized = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Stat-&gt;Value = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear the registration list and release the lock once we&#39;re done. Any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pending updates from other threads will safely take effect after we return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That might not be what the user wants if they&#39;re measuring a compilation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but it&#39;s their responsibility to prevent concurrent compilations to make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a single compilation measurable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Stats.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4956c1072998f3de28fb64a8979fcbf5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa5094c6f6a737f5a94596cdab0b2b449">llvm::PrintStatistics</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StatisticInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machineblockplacement-cpp/#a086f939e29b718dc5a01e4bcfe6af2a1">Stats</a> = &#42;<a href="#a9d1a0181d192027598d0cf59a7291e5d">StatInfo</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out how long the biggest Value and Name fields are.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDebugTypeLen = 0, MaxValLen = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic">TrackingStatistic</a> &#42;Stat : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machineblockplacement-cpp/#a086f939e29b718dc5a01e4bcfe6af2a1">Stats</a>.Stats) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxValLen = std::max(MaxValLen, (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41972fe6f3fab862543b7b835a714f9b">utostr</a>(Stat-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#a16d97f1b51dbcb20eb720512669a4642">getValue</a>()).size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxDebugTypeLen =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::max(MaxDebugTypeLen, (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)std::strlen(Stat-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingstatistic/#a30537c4d546fff17153fdc060d59ca77">getDebugType</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
